verses.verse: הוֹד֣וּ <S%H3034><s%> O give thanks לַיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for ט֑וֹב <S%H2896><s%> for [he is] good כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2617><s%> because his mercy
יֹֽאמַר־ <S%H559><s%> now say נָ֥א <S%H4994><s%> Oh יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Let Israel כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2617><s%> that his mercy

יֹֽאמְרוּ־ <S%H559><s%> now say נָ֥א <S%H4994><s%> Oh בֵֽית־ <S%H1004><s%> Let the house אַהֲרֹ֑ן <S%H175><s%> of Aaron כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2617><s%> that his mercy

יֹֽאמְרוּ־ <S%H559><s%> say נָ֭א <S%H4994><s%> Oh יִרְאֵ֣י <S%H3373><s%> Let them now that fear יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2617><s%> that his mercy

מִֽן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הַ֭מֵּצַ֥ר <S%H4712><s%> in distress קָרָ֣אתִי <S%H7121><s%> I called יָּ֑הּ <S%H3050><s%> upon the LORD עָנָ֖נִי <S%H6030><s%> answered בַמֶּרְחָ֣ב <S%H4800><s%> me [and set me] in a large place יָֽהּ׃ <S%H3050><s%> the LORD

יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD לִ֭י לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> I will not אִירָ֑א <S%H3372><s%> [is] on my side I will not fear מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> What יַּעֲשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> do לִ֣י אָדָֽם׃ <S%H120><s%> man

יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD לִ֭י בְּעֹזְרָ֑י <S%H5826><s%> taketh my part with them that help וַ֝אֲנִ֗י <S%H589><s%> I אֶרְאֶ֥ה <S%H7200><s%> me therefore shall I see בְשֹׂנְאָֽי׃ <S%H8130><s%> [my desire] upon them that hate
ט֗וֹב <S%H2896><s%> [It is] better לַחֲס֥וֹת <S%H2620><s%> to trust בַּיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> in the LORD מִ֝בְּטֹ֗חַ <S%H982><s%> than to put confidence בָּאָדָֽם׃ <S%H120><s%> in man
ט֗וֹב <S%H2896><s%> [It is] better לַחֲס֥וֹת <S%H2620><s%> to trust בַּיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> in the LORD מִ֝בְּטֹ֗חַ <S%H982><s%> than to put confidence בִּנְדִיבִֽים׃ <S%H5081><s%> in princes

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All גּוֹיִ֥ם <S%H1471><s%> All nations סְבָב֑וּנִי <S%H5437><s%> compassed me about בְּשֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> but in the name יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> will surely אֲמִילַֽם׃ <S%H4135><s%> will I destroy

סַבּ֥וּנִי <S%H5437><s%> They compassed me about גַם־ <S%H1571><s%> yes סְבָב֑וּנִי <S%H5437><s%> yea they compassed me about בְּשֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> but in the name יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> will surely אֲמִילַֽם׃ <S%H4135><s%> I will destroy

סַבּ֤וּנִי <S%H5437><s%> They compassed me about כִדְבוֹרִ֗ים <S%H1682><s%> like bees דֹּ֭עֲכוּ <S%H1846><s%> they are quenched כְּאֵ֣שׁ <S%H784><s%> as the fire קוֹצִ֑ים <S%H6975><s%> of thorns בְּשֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> for in the name יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> will surely אֲמִילַֽם׃ <S%H4135><s%> I will destroy
דַּחֹ֣ה <S%H1760><s%> Thou hast thrust דְחִיתַ֣נִי <S%H1760><s%> sore לִנְפֹּ֑ל <S%H5307><s%> at me that I might fall וַ֖יהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> but the LORD עֲזָרָֽנִי׃ <S%H5826><s%> helped
עָזִּ֣י <S%H5797><s%> [is] my strength וְזִמְרָ֣ת <S%H2176><s%> and song יָ֑הּ <S%H3050><s%> The LORD וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> has become לִ֝֗י לִֽישׁוּעָֽה׃ <S%H3444><s%> and is become my salvation

ק֤וֹל ׀ <S%H6963><s%> The voice רִנָּ֬ה <S%H7440><s%> of rejoicing וִֽישׁוּעָ֗ה <S%H3444><s%> and salvation בְּאָהֳלֵ֥י <S%H168><s%> [is] in the tabernacles צַדִּיקִ֑ים <S%H6662><s%> of the righteous יְמִ֥ין <S%H3225><s%> the right hand יְ֝הוָה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD עֹ֣שָׂה <S%H6213><s%> doeth חָֽיִל׃ <S%H2428><s%> valiantly

יְמִ֣ין <S%H3225><s%> The right hand יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD רוֹמֵמָ֑ה <S%H7426><s%> is exalted יְמִ֥ין <S%H3225><s%> the right hand יְ֝הוָה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD עֹ֣שָׂה <S%H6213><s%> doeth חָֽיִל׃ <S%H2428><s%> valiantly

לֹֽא <S%H3808><s%> I will not אָמ֥וּת <S%H4191><s%> I shall not die כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> but אֶֽחְיֶ֑ה <S%H2421><s%> but live וַ֝אֲסַפֵּ֗ר <S%H5608><s%> and declare מַֽעֲשֵׂ֥י <S%H4639><s%> the works יָֽהּ׃ <S%H3050><s%> of the LORD

יַסֹּ֣ר <S%H3256><s%> hath chastened יִסְּרַ֣נִּי <S%H3256><s%> me sore יָּ֑הּ <S%H3050><s%> The LORD וְ֝לַמָּ֗וֶת <S%H4194><s%> unto death לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> has not נְתָנָֽנִי׃ <S%H5414><s%> but he hath not given me over

פִּתְחוּ־ <S%H6605><s%> Open לִ֥י שַׁעֲרֵי־ <S%H8179><s%> to me the gates צֶ֑דֶק <S%H6664><s%> of righteousness אָֽבֹא־ <S%H935><s%> I will go בָ֝ם אוֹדֶ֥ה <S%H3034><s%> into them [and] I will praise יָֽהּ׃ <S%H3050><s%> the LORD
זֶֽה־ <S%H2088><s%> This הַשַּׁ֥עַר <S%H8179><s%> This gate לַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD צַ֝דִּיקִ֗ים <S%H6662><s%> into which the righteous יָבֹ֥אוּ <S%H935><s%> shall enter בֽוֹ׃

א֭וֹדְךָ <S%H3034><s%> I will praise כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for עֲנִיתָ֑נִי <S%H6030><s%> thee for thou hast heard וַתְּהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> have become לִ֝֗י לִֽישׁוּעָֽה׃ <S%H3444><s%> me and art become my salvation

אֶ֭בֶן <S%H68><s%> The stone מָאֲס֣וּ <S%H3988><s%> refused הַבּוֹנִ֑ים <S%H1129><s%> [which] the builders הָ֝יְתָ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> has become לְרֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> is become the head פִּנָּֽה׃ <S%H6438><s%> [stone] of the corner

מֵאֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> This is the LORD'S הָ֣יְתָה <S%H1961><s%> become זֹּ֑את <S%H2063><s%> likewise הִ֖יא <S%H1931><s%> It נִפְלָ֣את <S%H6381><s%> doing it [is] marvellous בְּעֵינֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H5869><s%> in our eyes

זֶה־ <S%H2088><s%> This הַ֭יּוֹם <S%H3117><s%> This [is] the day עָשָׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> hath made יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> [which] the LORD נָגִ֖ילָה <S%H1523><s%> we will rejoice וְנִשְׂמְחָ֣ה <S%H8055><s%> and be glad בֽוֹ׃

אָנָּ֣א <S%H577><s%> now I beseech יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> thee O LORD הוֹשִׁ֘יעָ֥ה <S%H3467><s%> Save נָּ֑א <S%H4994><s%> we אָֽנָּ֥א <S%H577><s%> I beseech יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD הַצְלִ֘יחָ֥ה <S%H6743><s%> thee send now prosperity נָּֽא׃ <S%H4994><s%> I beseech thee

בָּר֣וּךְ <S%H1288><s%> Blessed הַ֭בָּא <S%H935><s%> [be] he that cometh בְּשֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> in the name יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בֵּ֝רַֽכְנוּכֶ֗ם <S%H1288><s%> we have blessed מִבֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> you out of the house יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

אֵ֤ל ׀ <S%H410><s%> God יְהוָה֮ <S%H3068><s%> [is] the LORD וַיָּ֪אֶר <S%H216><s%> light לָ֥נוּ אִסְרוּ־ <S%H631><s%> bind חַ֥ג <S%H2282><s%> the sacrifice בַּעֲבֹתִ֑ים <S%H5688><s%> with cords עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against קַ֝רְנ֗וֹת <S%H7161><s%> [even] unto the horns הַמִּזְבֵּֽחַ׃ <S%H4196><s%> of the altar
אֵלִ֣י <S%H410><s%> Thou [art] my God אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> and I וְאוֹדֶ֑ךָּ <S%H3034><s%> and I will praise אֱ֝לֹהַ֗י <S%H430><s%> thee [thou art] my God אֲרוֹמְמֶֽךָּ׃ <S%H7311><s%> I will exalt

הוֹד֣וּ <S%H3034><s%> O give thanks לַיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for ט֑וֹב <S%H2896><s%> for [he is] good כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2617><s%> for his mercy
